trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia a serialização plug-ins criados, usando <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref>, pelos fabricantes que têm seus próprios formatos de serialização de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Somente os chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem criar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an object derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> class for the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> that will use the specified descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa um objeto derivado de abstrata <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> classe especificado <xref:System.IO.Stream>que usará o descritor especificado.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted applications can call CreateSerializerWriter.
trans-unit.target: Apenas aplicativos totalmente confiáveis podem chamar CreateSerializerWriter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> that contains serialization information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> que contém informações de serialização para o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to which the returned object writes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>para que grava o objeto retornado.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An object of a class derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de uma classe derivada de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is null.
trans-unit.target: Um dos parâmetros é nulo.

trans-unit.source: The serializerDescriptor is specifying the wrong version.
trans-unit.target: O serializerDescriptor é especificar a versão errada.

trans-unit.source: -or- It is not registered.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ele não está registrado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assembly file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: - ou - não é possível encontrar o arquivo de assembly.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assembly cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o assembly não pode ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de plug-in serializadores instalados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> objects already registered.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> objetos já registrados.

trans-unit.source: Registers a serializer plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Registra um serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Apenas chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método interpretará já registrado plug-in como o mesmo se ele for o mesmo em todas essas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> para o plug-in.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para substituir um registro existente para o plug-in; mesmo Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte comentários.

trans-unit.source: serializerDescriptor is null.
trans-unit.target: serializerDescriptoré nulo.

trans-unit.source: overwrite is and the plug-in is already registered.
trans-unit.target: overwriteé e o plug-in já está registrado.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Exclui um serializador de plug-in do registro.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Apenas chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método irá interpretar um registrado plug-in como o mesmo um passado para este método somente se ele for o mesmo em todas essas propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> para o plug-in.

trans-unit.source: serializerDescriptor is null.
trans-unit.target: serializerDescriptoré nulo.

trans-unit.source: The plug-in is not registered.
trans-unit.target: O plug-in não está registrado.

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
trans-unit.target: Consulte **comentários**.
